verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:20
verses.text: Moreover the candlesticks with their lamps, that they should burn after the manner before the oracle, of pure gold;

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:21
verses.text: And the flowers, and the lamps, and the tongs, made he of gold, and that perfect gold;

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:22
verses.text: And the snuffers, and the basons, and the spoons, and the censers, of pure gold: and the entry of the house, the inner doors thereof for the most holy place, and the doors of the house of the temple, were of gold.
